doc.title: Pin guo yao yi kou
doc.plot: Miss Sung comes to HK Island from Cheung Chau to work as teacher. She also hopes to moonlight as a model. On the net she is known as Little Angel and she confides her hopes and troubles to a net friend called Deep Blue. She finally gets a chance at modeling, but an argument with the lead photographer, Jet, ruins her chance. Later she tries to convince him that she really needs the money. Jet believes her and the two start to fall for each other. But Jet's step-sister starts to complicate matters.
